Hillsboro.Orenco MAX Station: Orenco MAX Station, formerly known as Orenco/Northwest 231st Avenue, is a light rail station in the MAX Light Rail system in Hillsboro, Oregon, United States. The station is the 14th stop westbound on the Westside MAX and is served by the Blue Line. Near the station is the award-winning Orenco Station mixed-use development, considered a positive model for Smart Growth development.
